138.heading: Girls.
138.title: Miracle Girls
138.author: by Nami Akimoto.
notes: Complete in 9 vols.

"Identical twins Toni and Mika have a secret, they have psychic powers! They can communicate with each other telepathically, and when they're together, they can teleport. When tom-boy Toni switches places with brainy Mika, comic and romantic mishaps ensue. Mika's creepy science teacher, Mr. K, is onto their secret and follows them around with a camera trying to get proof."

256.title: Girls and Sports

257.author: Feinstein & Bons.
257.series: Nov. 17, 2000) "And They Say Tiger is Good for the Game"*
notes: Summary: Bradley's girlfriend wants to go to the driving range, because Tiger Woods has gotten her interested in golf.

258.title: Girls and Sports
258.author: Feinstein & Bons.
258.series: Nov. 20, 2000) "When You Talk To Her, Be as Honest and Direct as Possible"*
notes: Summary: He's trying to tell Joann he thinks they need some time apart.

259.title: Girls and Sports
259.author: Feinstein & Borus.
notes: Summary: She's not convinced when Marshall says he's a writer.

260.title: Girls and Sports
260.author: Feinstein & Borus.
260.series: Dec. 1, 2000) "The Usual Stuff. War, Communism, the '84 Winter Olympics"*

261.title: Girls and Sports
261.author: Feinstein & Borus.
261.series: Dec. 4, 2000) "We Just Finished Talking. She's Not My Type"*
notes: Summary: Bradley sweats profusely and can't get up the nerve to say anything to the Dream Woman.

262.title: Girls and Sports
262.author: Feinstein & Borus.
notes: Summary: JoAnn keeps telling the waiter she needed more time, and finally he stops asking.

263.title: Girls and Sports
263.author: Feinstein & Borus.

Unsigned.

265.series: May 4, 2006) "If the NBA Playoffs are Teaching Me Anything, It's Patience"*
notes: Summary: His third date with Diane and they haven't made out yet.

266.title: Girls and Sports

267.title: Girls and Sports
